At this year’s National Convention & International Forum, you can already expect to be dazzled by the full cast of A&E’s Born this Way. Now, we’ve added even more star power! At our national convention in New Orleans in 2014, you may remember Ron Suskind, who gave a thrilling keynote address about his New York Times bestseller: Life, Animated. Now, his book has been made into a movie! LIFE, ANIMATED is the story of Owen Suskind, who as a a young toddler, lost his ability to speak until he and his family discovered a unique way to communicate by immersing themselves in the world of classic Disney animated films. Join us at convention and hear Owen and his brother Walt who will be headlining our closing plenary. Register today to see these amazing speakers and more!
